entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cache compaction will never start #59875
  • Assertion failed 'val->OperIs(GT_IND, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_CNS_INT)' #59871
    7.0.0
  • Scenario: Make it easy to find a certificate appropriate to a target hostname #59870
    7.0.0
  • Support for asymmetrical core energy efficiency #59866
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 RC 1 ASP.NET Core Blazor Microsoft Identity Libraries Errors when Published #59864
  • JIT: missing conditional branch merging across multiple BBs #59863
    Future
  • FontStyle and FontWeight localization #59862
  • [tvOS] System.ExecutionEngineException : Attempting to JIT compile method while running in aot-only mode. #59855

Closed

  • Type.IsAssignable() treats all enum arrays assignable from each other #59877
  • dotnet --info from x64 on ARM64 machine reports both x64 and ARM64 paths #59832
  • CS0433 The type 'ImageConverter' exists in both.... #59807
    Future
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeIntermediateWithInvalidRevocationName(pkiOptions: AllRevocation | IssuerAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #59627
  • Wrong X509 chain selected when we have multiple viable options #59584
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests.TimestampRequestTests.BuildExpectedRequest_FromHashAndOid(viaSpan: True) #59455
  • Unix file enumerator isn't thread safe #24295
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests.*.DoesntExistThenCreate_ReturnsDefaultValues fails on CI #30108
    7.0.0
  • Expose _version in List<T> and other collections #59854
  • System.Text.Json.Tests crashing with segfault in CI #57198
    7.0.0
  • AES using legacy code The string after encryption and decryption is not equivalent to the original one #57808
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Move runtime rolling builds to run twice a day on main #59884
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix code heap reservation size #59883
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix genCodeForInitBlkUnroll for x86 #59873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port workload description localization changes to main #59872
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59869
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix JS debugger tests #59868
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make libraries tests use the same config as the matching libraries build. #59867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Do not flush serializer buffers before first IAsyncEnumerable element is fetched #59865
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59861
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize DateTime.Equals #59857
    area-System.Runtime
  • Enable Crossgen for FreeBSD, now that it is actually implemented. #59853
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Annotate methods that get MethodBase from a stackwalk as RUC #59851
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Unix ARM64 RtlRestoreContext implementation #59849
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Change some P/Invokes back to non-blittable + GeneratedDllImport for better usability #59876
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use ProductVersion in how-to-debug-dump #59848
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XslCompiledTransform #59475
    area-System.Xml
  • Produce symbols archives #59842
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Pass directory path from call-site #59858
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix NRT warnings in source generated code #59817
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Remove 3 active issues #59790
    area-System.IO
  • Fix System.Speech.Tests OtherTests.PromptBuilder test on non-English OS #59524
    community-contribution
  • Do not flush serializer buffers before first IAsyncEnumerable element is fetched #59808
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Use the short form of an opcode in `ILGenerator.EmitWriteLine`. #59836
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Use `.maxstack 8` in the `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe` IL code. #59840
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Fix the --runtime-arg argument in runtime-test.js. #59852
    arch-wasm
  • Arm64: Align methods containing loops to 32B #59828
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update WCF dependencies on the compat pack (#59764) #59820
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Fix Unix ARM64 RtlRestoreContext implementation #59831
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: fix register arg size computation for OSR #59789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Improve value numbering for casts #59841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add back the nethost archive. #59847
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix resolveVirtualMethodHelper #59742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't regress SkipLocalsInit optimization on <= NET6 #59797
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update workload localization file directory structure #59827
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move MakeReproPackage logic to a shared location #59796
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked
  • Clean up fix for single-reg returned normalize-on-load vars #59645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Fix codeql checks #59839
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic (#59450) #59757
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Refactoring XmlWriterSettings #59467
    area-System.Xml
  • Refactoring XmlReaderSettings #59409
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • More tweaks to regex source generator code #59834
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Adjust SkipOnCoreClr for Match_ExcessPrefix test #59564
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Produce symbols archives #59843
    source-build, area-Setup, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Add beginnings of support for WASI. #59752
    arch-wasm
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • JIT: better support for patchpoints in try regions #59784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
